sourcesContent:
import { AcademicCapIcon, BookOpenIcon, ClipboardListIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline'; const Summary = () => { const summaryData = [ { icon: AcademicCapIcon, title: 'Enrolled Courses', count: 24, link: 'View details' }, { icon: BookOpenIcon, title: 'Lessons', count: 56, link: 'View details' }, { icon: ClipboardListIcon, title: 'Certificates', count: 17, link: 'View details' }, ]; return (

Welcome, Mr. Smith

{/* Summary Cards */}
{summaryData.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

{item.count}

{item.link}
))}
{/* Weekly Assessments */}

Weekly Assessments

Week 1

Week 2

); }; export default Summary;
